Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source Concept DetailsTarget Concept DetailsComment
Codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference|5.0.0Codes from
ReferenceReferencehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference#ReferenceFHIR R5 ComplexType `Reference` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions. Element `Reference` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference`.
Reference.referencereferencehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference#Reference.referenceElement `Reference.reference` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.reference`.
Reference.typetypehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference#Reference.typeElement `Reference.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.type`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Reference.typeElement `Reference.type` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `Reference`, but has no target element specified.
Reference.identifieridentifierhttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference#Reference.identifierElement `Reference.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.identifier`.
Basic.identifierElement matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier`, use that element instead. Element `Reference.identifier` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `Reference`, but has no target element specified.
Reference.displaydisplayhttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference#Reference.displayElement `Reference.display` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.display`.

name: ConceptMapR5ReferenceElementsForR4Reference
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Reference` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions.
Element `Reference` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference`.
Element `Reference.reference` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.reference`.
Element `Reference.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.type`.
Element `Reference.type` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `Reference`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Reference.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.identifier`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier`, use that element instead.
Element `Reference.identifier` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `Reference`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Reference.display` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Reference.display`.
